metadata.name: Csc.EXE Execution Form Potentially Suspicious Parent
metadata.comment: Detects a potentially suspicious parent of "csc.exe", which could be a sign of payload delivery.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\csc.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('csc.exe') AND (endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\cscript.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\excel.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\mshta.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\onenote.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\outlook.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\powerpnt.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\winword.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\wscript.exe')) OR (endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\powershell.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\pwsh.exe'))) AND (contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('-encoded ')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('frombase64string'))) OR process.parent_process.cmd_line rlike '\(\[Pp\]rogram\[Dd\]ata|%\(\[Ll\]ocal\)?\[Aa\]pp\[Dd\]ata%|\\\\\[Aa\]pp\[Dd\]ata\\\\\(\[Ll\]ocal\(\[Ll\]ow\)?|\[Rr\]oaming\)\)\\\\\[^\\\\\]\{1,256\}$' AND (contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower(':\\perflogs\\')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower(':\\users\\public\\')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower(':\\windows\\temp\\')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('\\temporary internet'))) AND contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower(':\\users\\')) AND contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('\\favorites\\')) AND contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower(':\\users\\')) AND contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('\\favourites\\')) AND contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower(':\\users\\')) AND contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('\\contacts\\')) AND contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower(':\\users\\')) AND contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('\\pictures\\'))) AND NOT (startswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('c:\\program files (x86)\\')) OR startswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('c:\\program files\\')) OR lower(process.parent_process.name) = lower('c:\\windows\\system32\\sdiagnhost.exe') OR lower(process.parent_process.name) = lower('c:\\windows\\system32\\inetsrv\\w3wp.exe')) AND NOT (lower(process.parent_process.name) = lower('c:\\programdata\\chocolatey\\choco.exe') OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('\\programdata\\microsoft\\windows defender advanced threat protection')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('jwb7aciazgbhagkabablagqaiga6ahqacgb1agualaaiag0acwbnaciaogaiaeeabgbzagkaygbsaguaiabyaguacqb1agkacgblahmaiabqag8adwblahiauwboaguababsacaadgazac4amaagag8acgagag4azqb3aguacgaiah0ajw')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('caewaiagyayqbpagwazqbkaciaogb0ahiadqblacwaigbtahmazwaiadoaigbbag4acwbpagiabablacaacgblaheadqbpahiazqbzacaauabvahcazqbyafmaaablagwabaagahyamwauadaaiabvahiaiabuaguadwblahiaigb9acca')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('nahsaigbmageaaqbsaguazaaiadoadabyahuazqasaciabqbzagcaiga6aciaqqbuahmaaqbiagwazqagahiazqbxahuaaqbyaguacwagafaabwb3aguacgbtaggazqbsagwaiab2admalgawacaabwbyacaabgblahcazqbyaciafqana'))))

output.summary: Detects a potentially suspicious parent of "csc.exe", which could be a sign of payload delivery.
